title: Punchy Gunshots
description: Gunshot sound effects for pistol, shotgun, machinegun, sniper rifle, submachinegun, heavy weapons, etc.
longDescription:
Watch this DEMO to hear the sound effects.

Are you tired of your guns which sound like toys? If the answer is YES, your search is over, because this pack will offer your guns, the necessary boost to take your game/project to the next level.

Punchy Gunshots contains more than 250 gunshot sound effects. There are 52 different guns but every bullet sound comes with 3-8 variations (in most of the cases there are 5 variations). As you can see in the video, every time the weapon fires, a different sound is played (which is randomly chosen) so this way the player has a very realistic experience. I have also setup an automatic fire and a sound concurrency rule, so the sounds will not excessively overlap (very useful especially for very high fire rate or for the sounds with a long tail). Because of this, there is no need for loops and the automatic fire uses only single shots. Here you can find realistic gunshots for pistol, sniper rifle, submachinegun, machinegun, shotgun, heavy artilleries, silenced shots etc. I tried o offer as much variety as possible, so there are gunshots with long tail, specific to exterior and there are also gunshots with small tail specific to closed spaces. From this point of view, the sound effects can be very useful for open world games but also for games where actions takes place indoor. The packs comes with a modified Firs Person Blueprint where I implemented automatic fire and a system to change the weapon sound during the gameplay (pressing the keys "1" and "2" the player can move forward and backward through the list of gunshot sound effects)
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  High quality and realistic sounds
  •  No need for loop sounds (a combination of sound concurrency setup, random single shots and automatic fire system make automatic fire realistic so there is no need of using audio loops)
  •  Professionally mixed and mastered

Number of Audio Waves: 263

Number of Audio Cues: 52

Sample rate / bit rate: - 44.100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: All you need to know in order to test the sound effects is written inside the Demo Level:

  1. Press Left Mouse Button to fire the current gunshot sound effect
  2. Use the keys "1" or "2" to change the current gunshot
  3. Hold Left Mouse Button for automatic fire

Important/Additional Notes: For those who want to change the fire rate of the weapons, in the First Person Character Blueprint there is a variable called: Firerate, which now has a value of 0.08. Increase or decrease that number to get different fire rates. This pack contains only gunshot sound effects (no reloading, cocking, etc )


If you like this pack, feel free to write a review and rate it. This will keep me motivated to create better and better assets. Thank you!
